SEARCH

Package org.opensearch.sdk

package org.opensearch.sdk
  • Related Packages

    Description

  • Class
    Description
    ActionListener
    A listener for actions on the local port.
    BaseExtension
    An abstract class that simplifies extension initialization and provides an instance of the runner.
    Extension
    This interface defines methods which an extension must provide.
    ExtensionSettings
    This class encapsulates the settings for an Extension.
    ExtensionsRunner
    The primary class to run an extension.
    ExtensionsRunnerForTest
    An Extension Runner for testing using test settings.
    NettyTransport
    This class initializes a Netty4Transport object and control communication between the extension and OpenSearch.
    SDKClient
    This class creates SDKClient for an extension to make requests to OpenSearch
    SDKClient.SDKClusterAdminClient
    Wraps an internal ClusterAdminClient, providing a drop-in replacement in existing plugins with a minimum of code changes.
    SDKClient.SDKIndicesClient
    Wraps an internal IndicesClient, providing a drop-in replacement in existing plugins with a minimum of code changes.
    SDKClient.SDKRestClient
    Deprecated.
    Use OpenSearchClient.
    SDKClusterService
    This class simulates methods normally called from OpenSearch ClusterService class.
    SDKNamedWriteableRegistry
    Combines Extension NamedWriteable with core OpenSearch NamedWriteable
    SDKNamedXContentRegistry
    Combines Extension NamedXContent with core OpenSearch NamedXContent
    SDKTransportService
    Wrapper class for TransportService and associated methods.
